<file>
00001| import './globals.css';
00002| import type { Metadata } from 'next';
00003| import { Inter } from 'next/font/google';
00004| import { Toaster } from '@/components/ui/sonner';
00005| import { QueryProvider } from '@/components/providers/query-provider';
00006| import { ThemeProvider } from '@/components/providers/theme-provider';
00007| import { SettingsProvider } from '@/components/providers/settings-provider';
00008| 
00009| const inter = Inter({ 
00010|   subsets: ['latin'],
00011|   variable: '--font-inter',
00012|   display: 'swap',
00013| });
00014| 
00015| export const metadata: Metadata = {
00016|   title: 'Linguala - European AI Translation Platform',
00017|   description: 'The European translation platform built for European languages and culture. Professional domain expertise, custom glossaries, and intelligent AI. Based in Europe, for Europe.',
00018|   keywords: 'european translation, EU languages, european translator, linguala, multilingual europe, professional translation, domain expertise',
00019|   authors: [{ name: 'Linguala Europe' }],
00020|   creator: 'Linguala',
00021|   publisher: 'Linguala Europe',
00022|   robots: 'index, follow',
00023|   openGraph: {
00024|     type: 'website',
00025|     locale: 'en_EU',
00026|     url: 'https://linguala.eu',
00027|     title: 'Linguala - European AI Translation Platform',
00028|     description: 'The European translation platform built for European languages and culture',
00029|     siteName: 'Linguala',
00030|   },
00031|   twitter: {
00032|     card: 'summary_large_image',
00033|     title: 'Linguala - European AI Translation Platform',
00034|     description: 'European translation platform built for European languages and culture',
00035|     creator: '@linguala',
00036|   },
00037| };
00038| 
00039| export const viewport = {
00040|   width: 'device-width',
00041|   initialScale: 1,
00042|   themeColor: '#3B82F6',
00043| };
00044| 
00045| export default function RootLayout({
00046|   children,
00047| }: {
00048|   children: React.ReactNode;
00049| }) {
00050|   return (
00051|     <html lang="en" suppressHydrationWarning>
00052|       <body className={inter.className}>
00053|         <ThemeProvider
00054|           defaultTheme="system"
00055|         >
00056|           <SettingsProvider>
00057|             <QueryProvider>
00058|               {children}
00059|             </QueryProvider>
00060|             <Toaster />
00061|           </SettingsProvider>
00062|         </ThemeProvider>
00063|         {/* TODO: Remove iframe-navigation.js in production, should never be removed by AI */}
00064|         <script src="/scripts/iframe-navigation.js"></script>
00065|       </body>
00066|     </html>
00067|   );
00068| }
00069| 
</file>
